Outcome.DescriptionText: As your troops landed, they saw that the space elevator is very old and can crumble any moment, sadly due to vibrations of the troop shuttles the elevator started to slowly tilt and crumble. The Enormous structure was breaking apart in high altitudes and start raining down in balls of fire to planet surface damaging it severly!

As your troops landed, they saw that the space elevator is very old and beyond repair. The best solution was carefully demolish it in controllable faction to prevent it from the catastrophic collapse. As your troops began placing the demolition charges, a horde of antlions crawl out of the structure. A fierce battle was raging on, creating in the process more damage to the structure which started to collapse.

As your troops approach the Space Elevator, they noticed its fully operational and ready to be used. Sadly the elevator wasnt noticed only by our scanners. Remnant fleet warps into orbit and start bombarding the structure.
